Event.name: Work
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> expends effort towards achieving a <fen>Goal</fen>. Alternatively, a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> involved in the <fen>Goal</fen> can be expressed in place of a <fen>Goal</fen> expression.
<ex>In addition, <fex name="Agent">our organization</fex> will <t>work</t> <fex name="Goal">on improving accountability in every department</fex>.</ex>
<ex>If <fex name="Agent">somebody</fex> is <t>working</t> <fex name="sal_ent">on the pipes of your house</fex> and you turn on the faucet hard, you get sand, junk.</ex>
<ex>You could see <fex name="Agent">several students</fex> <t>plugging away</t> <fex name="Goal">at the problem</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">All the young medics</fex> <t>worked</t> <fex name="Manner">tirelessly</fex> <fex name="Salient_entity">in the blister bunker</fex>.</ex> <ex>All the young medics <t>worked</t> tirelessly <fex name="Place">in the blister bunker</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Goal
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the <fen>Agent</fen> expends effort to achieve.</def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Outcome</fen> is the failure or success of an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the effort is done.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which an attempt occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the effort occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Depictive</fen> is a phrase which describes the <fen>Agent</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The place where the work is done.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Agent</fen> puts in effort in acheiving the <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time peiod over which the work takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The reason for which the <fen>Agent</fen> puts effort into achieving the <fen>Goal</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states. In addition, most expressions of Particular_iteration indicate which instance of the series is being referred to.</def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is independent of the the attempt of the <fen>Agent</fen> to achieve the <fen>Goal</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Domain
Arg.definition: <def-root>The domain or area within which the work towards the <fen>Goal</fen> belongs. </def-root>

Arg.name: Salient_entity
Arg.definition: <def-root>An entity that is centrally involved in the <fen>Goal</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> is attempting to acheive.</def-root>

Arg.name: Event_description
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE applies to appraisals of the event, typically a judgment of its expectedness. </def-root>

Arg.name: Descriptor
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Descriptor</fen> covers any characterization or description of the target that is not covered by another more specific FE.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: work.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: exert effort towards acheiving a goal.

lexUnit.name: work.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: activity involving mental or physical effort done in order to achieve a result.

lexUnit.name: plug away.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: proceed steadily and laboriously with a task.

lexUnit.name: bang away.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: work hard over a long period.
